name: The Live Love Laugh Foundation
briefDescription: The foundation seeks to champion the cause of mental health in India, with a focus on depression in particular. Over the next few years, The Live Love Laugh Foundation will focus onIncreasing awareness of mental health issuesReducing the stigma around mental healthWork & collaborate with other NGOs in the field of mental healthEncourage research that would help design local solutions

address: 703, 9th A Main, Off CMH road Indiranagar
